text: Andy Z. Lehrer (16 May 1930 - January or February 2014) was a Romanian entomologist. From 1996 until his death, he worked as a research associate in the laboratory of Zoology at the University of Tel Aviv in Tel Aviv, Israel. For several years, he studied flesh flies and blow flies all over the world. Lehrer was born born in Iaşi, Iaşi County. He died in early 2014, aged 83. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1930 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Romanian biologists Category:Entomologists Category:Academics of Tel Aviv University
title: Andy Lehrer
